Package es.gencom.mpegg.io

Interface MPEGReader

    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends BitReader
    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro

                              throws IOException

        the unsigned integer
        Throws:

        default String readNTString()
                     throws IOException
        Reads null (0) terminated String from the bitstream.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readChars

        default char[] readChars​(int nchars)
                  throws IOException
        Reads characters from the bitstream.
        Parameters:
        nchars - number of characters to read,
        Returns:
        read characters.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readPayload

        Payload readPayload​(long size)
             throws IOException
        Reads size number of bytes from the bit stream to a new payload. Before reading the stream is aligned to bytes.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of bytes to be read.
        Returns:
        payload with read data.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readByteBuffer

        ByteBuffer readByteBuffer​(int size)
                   throws IOException
        Reads byte buffer from the bit stream. Before reading the stream is aligned to bytes.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of bytes to be read.
        Returns:
        byte buffer with read data.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPosition

        long getPosition()
          throws IOException
        Returns position in the MPEGReader. Returns the position in number of bytes since the initial position. If not byte aligned, the position corresponds to the next aligned position.
        Returns:
        current reader position
        Throws:
        IOException
